name: 404 (Necromus36)
description:
404 is an adventure game where robots that humans made start to

conquer the world. You left your city and have not been found by the robots yet. Your objective is to find a way to get off planet Earth.

As of right now, the game doesn't have any story or enemies. It is pretty much visuals right now and the only thing you can do is explore.

This game was made based on a tutorial from a game course I bought.  You can see more about that course here.

https://www.fulltimegamedev.com/

This is also another game course that was mentioned in the other game course and it is kind of like the continuation of the tutorial I took. Here is the course

https://www.gamedevunlocked.com/

Hope You Enjoy
